Topic Summary: This is an appeal against Revenue's refusal to grant a VRT registration (TAN authorisation) under Section 136 of the FA 1992, as amended, in respect the sale of cars at this business premiseSection
Tax Legislation: Section 145(3) Finance Act 2001; Section 146 Finance Act 2001 (as amended); Section 136 Finance Act 1992; Section 14 Vehicle Registration and Taxation Regulations 1992;
